Text: William D. Russell (director):  In the early fifties he began directing for television with Screen Gems, and his many credits include episodes of "Father Knows Best" (he was with the show from 1954 to 1956), "Dennis the Menace", "Perry Mason", "Hazel", "Bewitched", "the Farmer's Daughter" and "Family Affair".
